page.title: 11WINN FARM MACHINERY & POWER
page.content: Machinery used on the farm includes 4 tractors, a bailer, a mower, a forage harvester, hay bobbie for turning grass, a slurry spreader, a snow blower and silos. The family also use two cars. The main source of energy used is mains electricity but the farm has its own generator to boost supply in Winter. There is no mains gas. The house is heated by a coal fire only, plus logs. The water comes from a mains supply plus a natural spring. The land is fertilised annually with 150 units of nitrogen, 30 units of phosphate and 130 units of potash.
